@TheYoungspy56_5 You need a modem to receive internet service.  A router would only create a way to connect wirelessly.  You may need to reach out to a contractor to run the line for you if you are not able to do so. -Marc
@TheYoungspy56_5 Is your router a modem/router combo? If you want to move your router elsewhere, you would need to run a long enough cable to that location. -Marc
@TheYoungspy56_5 How are you receiving internet service without a modem? -Marc
@TheYoungspy56_5 Plug a device into the modem using an ethernet cable. -Marc
@TheYoungspy56_5 Is that on every device?  Also, can you test it hardwired? -Marc
@TheYoungspy56_5 What about the devices that are hardwired? -Mar
